name: Imperfect Reflection
description:
Made for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2020 

  

Gameplay:

Help guide a robot and its reflection through a strange world. Moving left with one robot will move the other to the right, and vice versa, so try to keep track of both while you maneuver them to the exits!

 

Controls:

Use A and D or the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to move

Use W, SPACE, or the UP arrow to jump

 

Credits: 

Made for FranGhigli2003 (Hellooooo!)

Art made with Aseprite

Color Palette: 
Robots Are Cool! Palette by Enzo Gray (on Lospec)
